Text: The roms are named with some numbers instead of letters, by legally issues, just rename the rom with the name that you wish but the extensión .nd5 must be changed to .nds (number 5 for an s). or .d5i for .dsi (in case that the is an DSi rom)!!!WARNING¡¡¡WE ARE NOT RESPONSIBLES FOR THE USE OF THIS SOTWARE, THIS SOFTWARE IS PUBLISHED ONLY FOR BACKUP PURPOSES ONLY....
